Entry.JapaneseText: ハックなら、あの<Cyan>「聖壇」<White>に隠されてる聖獣の謎を 読み解けるかもしれないな。
Entry.EnglishText: Hack might be able to uncover the secrets of the Sacred Beast that were hidden in the <Cyan>altar<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、ハックは先に<Cyan>「聖壇」<White>に向かった。 行ってみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, Hack went to the altar ahead of us. Let's head over there.
